rukus.text: 51|47|Mo osmonro ʙa tavon [-i xud] ʙino nihodem va hamvora onro vus'at meʙaxsem
51|48|Va zaminro [ʙaroi zindagi] gusturdem va ci nek gusturonandae hastem
51|49|Va hama cizro ʙa surati zavc [cuft] ofaridem; ʙosad, ki [tavaccuh kuned va] pand gired
51|50|[Ej Pajomʙar, ʙa mardum ʙigu:] «Pas, ʙa suji Alloh taolo ʙistoʙed, ki man az coniʙi U ʙaroi sumo husdordihandae oskoram
51|51|Va dar kanori Alloh taolo ma'ʙudi digare qaror nadihed, jaqinan, man az [coniʙi] U ʙaroi sumo husdordihandae oskoram»
51|52|Har pajomʙare, ki ʙar pesinijonason maʙ'us sud, hamin guna guftand: «[U jo] Codugar ast jo devona»
51|53|Ojo jakdigarro ʙa in [kufru takziʙ] suporis karda ʙudand? Na, ʙalki mardume sarkas ʙudand
51|54|Pas, [ej pajomʙar] az onon ruj ʙigardon, ki tu [ʙa xotiri kufri onon] hargiz sazovori sarzanis nesti
51|55|Va [pajvasta ʙa onon] tazakkur ʙideh, ki, hatman, tazakkur ʙaroi mu'minon sudʙaxs ast
51|56|Va cinnu insro faqat ʙaroi in ofaridam, ki Maro iʙodat kunand [va az ʙandagii digaron sar ʙoz zanand]
51|57|Na az onon ruzi mexoham, na in ki Maro xurok dihand
51|58|[Zero] Alloh taolo ast, ki ruzirasoni nerumand va ʙarqaror ast
51|59|Sitamgoron [-i musrik niz] hamcun joron [-i guzasta]-i xes sahme az azoʙ dorand; pas, ʙa sitoʙ [onro] az Man naxohand
51|60|Pas, voj ʙar kofiron az [azoʙi] ruzi mav'udason
